description:
Reports of the Devil Gundam surfacing in Shinjuku send Domon and Rain to Neo Japan. They run into an army of Death Army mobile suits controlled by the Devil Gundam and Domon tries to call his Shining Gundam.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Er ist der Ungeschlagene des Ostens! Master Asia hat seinen Auftritt
He`s the Undefeated of the East! Master Asia Appears
On l’appelle l’Invaincu d’Orient ! Master Asia entre en scène
Sono Na wa Touhou Fuhai! Master Asia Kenzan
その名は東方不敗! マスター・アジア見参
